description: Tactile feedback, gesture navigation, and UI refinements.
changelog:
• New Gesture Navigation: Swipe left/right on the list to quickly filter by Limbu alphabet.
• Tactile Feedback: Added a master Haptic Feedback toggle for a more physical feel.
• UI/UX Overhaul: Replaced system toasts with modern Snackbars and updated button iconography.
• Improved Flow: Moved 'Daily Word' to an elegant dialog and added 'Double Back to Exit'.
• Privacy & Security: Integrated Privacy Policy within the About page.
• Bug Fixes: Resolved search indicator glitches and optimized list performance.
